name: outlook-addin-server
description: Local HTTPS server for Outlook add-in testing

scripts.setup: npm run install-ca && npm run generate-certs
scripts.test-urls: echo 'Testing URLs...' && curl -s -o /dev/null -w '%{http_code}' https://localhost:3000/index.html && echo ' - index.html' && curl -s -o /dev/null -w '%{http_code}' https://localhost:3000/icon-16.png && echo ' - icon-16.png' && curl -s -o /dev/null -w '%{http_code}' https://localhost:3000/icon-32.png && echo ' - icon-32.png' && curl -s -o /dev/null -w '%{http_code}' https://localhost:3000/icon-80.png && echo ' - icon-80.png'
